Package com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl

Class PresaleServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl.PresaleServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PresaleService
@Service public class PresaleServiceImpl extends Object implements PresaleService
This class implements the PresaleService interface and provides methods for managing presale interests for events. It allows users to express interest in events, selects users for presale, and sends email notifications to selected users for early ticket sales.

  • Field Summary

    • findPresaleInterestByID

      public Optional<PresaleInterest> findPresaleInterestByID(EventUserId eventUserId)
      Finds a presale interest record by its composite key, represented by an EventUserId.
      Specified by:
      findPresaleInterestByID in interface PresaleService
      Parameters:
      eventUserId - The composite key consisting of User and Event for the presale interest.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the presale interest, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • existsById

      public Boolean existsById(EventUserId id)
      Checks if a presale interest record with the given EventUserId composite key exists.
      Specified by:
      existsById in interface PresaleService
      Parameters:
      id - The composite key to check for existence.
      Returns:
      true if a matching presale interest record exists, false otherwise.

    • findUsersSelectedForEvent

      public List<User> findUsersSelectedForEvent(Event event, Boolean selected)
      Finds a list of users selected for a specific event's presale.
      Specified by:
      findUsersSelectedForEvent in interface PresaleService
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which to find selected users.
      selected - true to find users who are selected, false to find those who are not.
      Returns:
      A list of users selected or not selected for the event's presale.

    • setPresaleInterest

      public void setPresaleInterest(User user, Event event, Boolean selected, Boolean emailed)
      Sets a user's presale interest for an event, indicating whether they are selected and emailed.
      Specified by:
      setPresaleInterest in interface PresaleService
      Parameters:
      user - The user expressing interest.
      event - The event of interest.
      selected - true if the user is selected, false otherwise.
      emailed - true if an email was sent, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistsException - If the user has already expressed interest in the event.

    • selectPresaleUsersForEvent

      public void selectPresaleUsersForEvent(Event event)
      Randomly selects a certain number of users for a specific event's presale based on the number of available tickets.
      Specified by:
      selectPresaleUsersForEvent in interface PresaleService
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which to select users for the presale.

    • sendScheduledEmails

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=60000L) public void sendScheduledEmails()
      Sends scheduled email notifications to selected users, two at a time for early ticket sales. This method runs periodically based on a fixed rate, currently set at 1 minute.
      Specified by:
      sendScheduledEmails in interface PresaleService
